citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30-2:00 PM on
July 6, 2023. Upon arrival, inspector knocked on door, called the available phone numbers, left voice mail messages, and
sent text messages. Prior to leaving the facility, the primary number was called again and voice message was left.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30-2:00 PM on 
July 6, 2023. Upon arrival, inspector knocked on door, called the available phone numbers, left voice mail messages, and 
sent text messages. Prior to leaving the facility, the primary number was called again and voice message was left. 
 
 
End Section
